system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.MjNoL6QtM0Nptxsw]{Rifle Specialis}t, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.q2CTcyiqF0ovbeZH]{Rifle and SMG Reloader},

Benefit

Twice per round when the character is wielding an assault, battle, carbine, or target rifle, or sub-machine gun, and is targeted by any ranged attack, the character may immediately make a single ranged attack targeted at the creature that originally attacked them using their wielded assault, battle, carbine, or target rifle, or sub-machine gun. This attack may be any standard attack, and may not use any called shot attack modifiers. This attack can not cost more than 8 Combat Points. Both of these attacks are resolved at the same time. Also, when readying an attack with an assault, battle, carbine, or target rifle, or sub-machine gun the Combat Point cost is 2 less.

Special

If a character selects the Rifle Ace Feat, they may not select the Rifle Expert Feat.
system.summary: Twice per round fire back when targeted, -2 CP to ready
